item.description:
Here's the description of the film:
Versailles by Pierre Schnoeller (2008, 102 min). In Paris, Nina and her young son are homeless. Their constant drifting leads them to Versailles, where they spend the night with Damien, who lives in a hut in the woods near the famous palace. Early the next morning, Nina leaves the child and vanishes. As the days and seasons pass, Damien and the child form a close bond, but they know they cannot live in the hut forever.

After the film we'll head to a nearby restaurant for dinner.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be up front by the screen at the end of the film. Look for the MeetUp sign
item.name: Versailles at the MFA French film festival
